product_series.name: SSD D3 Series
product_series.description: Value-optimized SSDs engineered to accelerate storage performance and reduce Total Cost of Ownership while preserving legacy infrastructure with exceptional reliability.

products.name: D3-S4620
products.description: Mid-endurance SATA drives available in capacities up to 3.84 TB, designed to increase server efficiency and boost IOPS/TB performance over legacy hard disk drives (HDDs).

products.name: D3-S4520
products.description: Standard-endurance SATA drives with capacities up to 7.68 TB, designed to increase server efficiency and boost IOPS/TB performance over legacy hard disk drives (HDDs) for cloud storage.

product_series.name: D5 Series SSDs
product_series.description: Hyper-dense, power-efficient SSDs optimized for read-intensive, data-intensive, and mainstream workloads. Maximize space, power, and capacity with our flagship, industry-leading 122TB D5-P5336 SSDs.

products.name: D5-P5336
products.description: Optimized for the edge to the core, the D5-P5336 is a hyper-scalable, cost-effective solution that lets you efficiently accelerate data.

products.name: D5-P5430
products.description: Discover the hyper-dense D5-P5430 QLC SSD, a PCIe 4.0 drive with capacities up to 30.72TB. TLC-level performance for mainstream, read-intensive workloads.

products.name: D5-P5316
products.description: Discover the D5-P5316, highly efficient, read-optimized PCIe 4.0 drives with capacities up to 30.72 TB, designed for read-intensive and sequential workloads.

product_series.name: SSD D7 Series
product_series.description: Our highest-performing family of SSDs, the Solidigm D7 Series is engineered for the most demanding workloads.

products.name: D7-PS1030
products.description: Discover Gen5 PCIe 5.0 performance with mid-endurance and capacities up to 12.8TB, designed to accelerate write-centric and mixed workloads.

products.name: D7-PS1010
products.description: Class-leading PCIe 5.0 performance with standard endurance and capacities up to 15.36TB, designed to accelerate mainstream workloads.
